column1: Kata Robata////Everything was made to perfection! For about $60 a person
column2: we got the full experience. From the skewers to the cheesecake
column3: everything was amazing! The sashimi was fatty
column4: fresh and prepared well. The sushi did not have too much rice
column5: the fish was super fresh and the other toppings in the roll complimented each other so well! Everyone in my group left extremely satisfied! Service was quick and super friendly! We had to wait 2 hours to be seated (put our name down at 6:30pm for 6 people) but other than that
column6: I would say it was a perfect experience!
